title: It’s Me, Hilary: The Man Who Drew Eloise Companion Podcast
description:
Sponsor Content: In this official companion to the HBO Documentary film It’s Me, Hilary, host Hugo Lindgren speaks with illustrator and author Hilary Knight, and the documentary’s director Matt Wolf. It’s Me, Hilary: The Man Who Drew Eloise debuts on HBO March 23 at 9 pm eastern. See HBO.com for more info.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
